result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel D Erdmann was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • OWI (5th or 6th), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Any vehicles titled and registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID; as is the defendant himself.

miscConds.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been faxed to the probation office.

timeConds.notes: w/Huber for all purposes; work, treatment, school (combination); to commence within 45 days; NO OBJECTION to EMP

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Case called: 9;48am. Clerk: Denise. INCLUDES 13CM753, 14CF200. State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher. Defendant appears by Atty Julie Sawyer. State moves and files Amended Complaint in 14CF200.  Crt proceeds with Initial Appearance 14CF200. W/R. Atty Sawyer in receipt of Complaint. State moves to DI 13CM753- crt grants. Crt proceeds with Waiver of Prelim. Waiver of Prelim. filed.  Court questions deft as to waiver. Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  Information filed.  Reading Waived. Crt proceeds with Plea/Sentencing 14CF200. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed.  PLEA: NO CONTEST - ct 1 (OWI-5th). Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. Atty Sawyer makes statement. Defendant makes statement. COURT ORDERS: SWH - 3 yrs probation. CONDITIONS: $2,182.00 inclusive cc; Crt remits DNA Surcharge;  6 months MCJ w/huber for all purposes, work, treatment, school (combination); to commence w/int 45 days;  no objection to EMP;  Any vehicles titled and registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 3 years as is the defendant himself, and device to be installed; $50 IID Installation fee to be paid; Half-Priced IID ordered as defendant qualifies; 3 yrs dl revocation; AODA-Cty Resident. 24 days Credit. Crt advises and defendant signs Ineligible Voting Form. Adjourned: 10:01am.
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
